author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Sesame Prawn Toasts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sesame Prawn Toasts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 slices firm white sandwich bread, crusts trimmed
250g medium prawn, peeled and coarsely chopped
0.5 fresh ginger, the piece should be of 5 cm before cutting it, peeled and shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the prawns and scallions, white and green parts, in a food processor and process until they form a paste. Transfer to a bowl and stir in the ginger, soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, and enough egg white to bind the mixture together. Season with the pepper.
Spread the bread thickly with the prawn paste. Cut each slice into four triangles. Sprinkle the sesame seeds evenly over the top.

Pour enough oil into a deep-fryer or skillet to come halfway up the sides, and heat to 180°C. In batches, add the toasts, prawn sides down, and deep-fry for 2 minutes, until the prawn paste is puffed. Carefully turn them over and deep-fry until the toasts are crisp and golden brown.
Using a slotted spoon, transfer the toasts to paper towels and drain briefly. Serve hot, garnished with coriander.
